if (len(s) % 2 == 0) and (s[0] in 'RUD') and (s[-1] in 'LUD'):

else:

s = list(input())
n = len(s)
odds = [s[i] for i in range(n) if i % 2 == 0]
evens = [s[i] for i in range(n) if i % 2 == 1]
if all(x in ['R', 'U', 'D'] for x in odds) and all(x in ['L', 'U', 'D'] for x in evens):
    print("Yes")
else:
    print("No")

#!/usr/bin/env python3
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
"""
Created on Fri Aug  2 15:52:54 2019
@author: kasum
"""
s = list(input())
n = len(s)

odds = [s[i] for i in range(n) if i % 2 == 0]
evens = [s[i] for i in range(n) if i % 2 == 1]
if all(x in ['R', 'U', 'D'] for x in odds) and all(x in ['L', 'U', 'D'] for x in evens):
    print("Yes")
else:
    print("No")


s = list(input().split())

n = len(s)

odds = [s[i] for i in range(n) if i % 2 == 0]
evens = [s[i] for i in range(n) if i % 2 == 1]

if all(x in ['R', 'U', 'D'] for x in odds) and all(x in ['L', 'U', 'D'] for x in evens):
    print("Yes")
else:
    print("No")
